alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Gratiot (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 8:02AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gratiot and Clinton Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 802 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grand Ledge, or 8 miles northwest of Lansing, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alma... St. Johns... Ithaca... Grand Ledge... St. Louis... Breckenridge... Elsie... DeWitt... Capital Region Inter... Eureka... Wheeler... Sumner... Ovid... Fowler... North Star... Westphalia... Maple Rapids... Ashley... Perrinton... Hubbardston... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
